Māori Business Leaders Awards: Celebrating Māori excellence in business https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/maori-business-leaders-awards-celebating-maori-excellence-in-business/W3PAGP3FJ5CVPGHA254XZ6N5J4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/maori-business-leaders-awards-celebating-maori-excellence-in-business/W3PAGP3FJ5CVPGHA254XZ6N5J4/ Stage set for a celebration of the collective spirit of Māori entrepreneurship. Tue, 15 Oct 2024 18:26:53 +0000 CEO Georgia Latu (in red pants) received the Young Māori Business Leader Award in 2022 for Pōtiki Poi, the world’s largest poi-manufacturing business. She's pictured with her mum and guests from event sponsor the Asia New Zealand Foundation.
